Plan: 1 to add, 1 to drop.

Summary by type:
  functions: 1 to add, 1 to drop

Functions:
  - somefunction
  + somefunction

DDL to be executed:
--------------------------------------------------

DROP FUNCTION IF EXISTS somefunction(text);

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION somefunction(
    param2 uuid
)
RETURNS uuid
LANGUAGE sql
VOLATILE
AS $$ SELECT param2;
$$;
